title: Miso di Riso
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Italian, Macrobiotic, Organic, Raw, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out
description: A 100% organic vegan and vegetarian restaurant, of which some dishes are also macrobiotic and/or raw. Serves breakfast, cakes, lunch, snacks, aperitifs, dinner and after dinner. Relaxing atmosphere with a lot of plants. Very quiet courtyard and a small organic shop with tea room. Some items for sale are organic products, plants, chairs, tables, lampshades, plates and cups. Exhibitions of contemporary art changes every two months.
